q2.question:

Pair *p = pair_create("Vampire", 2);

How much memory is allocated in the following memory regions?

  1. Stack: ____
  2. Heap: ____
  3. Data: ____

q5.question:
Download War and Peace (2600.txt) and Pride and Prejudice (1342):

# Download War and Peace
$ curl -LO https://www3.nd.edu/~pbui/teaching/cse.20312.fa23/static/txt/2600.txt

# Download Pride and Prejudice
$ curl -LO https://www3.nd.edu/~pbui/teaching/cse.20312.fa23/static/txt/1342.txt

Use your bin/freq on these files to answer the following questions:

  1. War and Peace: What is the most frequent word? ____
  2. War and Peace: What is the most frequent pronoun? ____
  3. Pride and Prejudice: What is the most frequent word? ____
  4. Pride and Prejudice: What is the most frequent pronoun? ____

q6.question:
Add the -O2 compiler flag to your Makefile and then rebuild everything with make clean ; make. Next, run the provided bin/benchmark.py script with each of the files (ie. bin/benchmark.py 2600.txt) above to measure the runtimes of the various hash functions in bin/freq with different alpha values. Perform this measurement a few times until a pattern emerges.

Which of the following statements are true (select all that apply)?
